item.title: Quick Setup
item.description: Here are some one-liners for quick and easy first setups of various operating systems. Check out the project to learn more: Quick-Setup Linux: Open the Terminal app. Copy and Paste the following code into the app, and then press Enter. Enter your password if necessary. curl -sSL https://bit.ly/2Yi6fns | bash Here’s the script https://git.io/JLxkS Here’s what it does: -> Updates repositories via `sudo apt update` -> Downloads and Installs TeamViewer.
